name: Yubii
0:
”Alexa, turn on Movie Night.”
”Alexa, set Kitchen Lights to 50 percent.”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Yubii knows that sometimes you need a third hand!

Yubii Skill for Amazon Alexa make your smart appliances even more convenient to use and your home more comfortable, friendly and accessible.

Yubii skill for Amazon Alexa will help you control lights, blinds/shutters, gates, scenes and even more without even lifting a finger. You won’t need to find your phone, go to wall switches, or even use remote controls - just ask Alexa.

"Alexa, activate Movie Night scene."
"Alexa, set the kitchen lights to 50%."

To control the Yubii smart home ecosystem with Alexa you would need:
•   A Yubii Home gateway, with firmware version 5.100 or newer;
•  A FIBARO ID account associated to your gateway (it is an account that allows you to use all Yubii services with one profile);
•  An Amazon Alexa device.


To learn how to get started or in case you still have some questions regarding the compatibility with Alexa, visit the dedicated webpage: manuals.fibaro.com/alexa

To find out more about the Yubii ecosystem here’s the dedicate website: yubiihome.com
